page.title: 10THE GRINDLEFORD CAFE
page.content: Mrs. James works and lives in a cafe in Grindleford.The meals she mostly serves are{cooked meals}in winter, and {cold meals}in summer.Mrs James has fifty to a hundred people in the weekend but she knows quite a few regulars who come into her cafe every week. Her family has worked in the cafe for three years but she has never had another cafe in her life. She sells{cream teas,teas,scampi, {childrens meals and toast. She also has{walkers}in, they normally come in to have a snack and a cup of tea. This is because they are walking around the{edges and moors {above Grindleford.
